front.title: Considerations on IP Spatial Location Protocol Requirements

abstract.t: This document addresses those requirements for IP spatial location protocol that emerges from the situation where mobile hosts (MH) use location information in the inter-domain mobility management. While IP spatial location protocol has many other usage cases, this document focuses on the requirements for mobile IP device that needs to know the whereabouts of IP subnetwork to be visited in order to prepare for handoff. Three inter-technology handoff (ITHO) scenarios and the related problems are presented, and the requirements for the system architecture, terminal and IP spatial location protocol are outlined.
